text: If the respondent dies after parentage has been established and prior to the time the child reaches the age at which the child ceases to be a minor, any sums due and unpaid under an order of the court at the time of his or her death shall constitute a valid claim against his or her estate.
historical:

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Death of respondent; liability of estate.
